rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with low-level threshold to enhance natural ventilation.
Open plan living area focusing on ample natural light and cross ventilation via large windows adjoining the courtyard.
A compact dining area adjacent to the living room and kitchen for family gatherings.
Functional kitchen with ample natural light and ventilation; positioned near the courtyard to allow fresh air circulation.
One of four bedrooms designed with emphasis on privacy and natural light, positioned towards the quieter part of the house.
Second bedroom with similar design to maintain uniformity and natural ventilation.
Third bedroom emphasizing privacy and a view of the garden.
Fourth bedroom with natural light and ventilation, situated on the periphery to minimize noise from public areas.
Bathroom attached to each bedroom where possible; designed for minimal space usage and efficient water drainage in accordance with local building norms.
Storage area near the entrance for quick access and efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Doorway from the entrance hall to the garden, facilitating natural ventilation.
Large window openings in living room adjoining the central courtyard for ample light and air flow.
North-facing windows in bedrooms to optimize natural light and maintain temperature balance.
Window openings in the kitchen offering a view of the courtyard for improved ventilation.
